11.title: One of his sensai come up with a new training m...

choices: Kenichi Disobeys and makes a run for it
The elder is done waiting and sits on Kenichi
114.content:
Since everyone is training, Hayato decides it might be a little fun to "train" with Kenichi.
Hayato walks up behind Kenichi, while he is training, and puts him in a headlock. The elder's muscles holds Kenichi as his reeking armpit covers Kenichi's face.

"Hey Kenichi you want to train with me?" Hayato asks sadistically,
Kenichi can't hear a word of the elder's as he is trying to break free of the headlock.
"Huh. What's that? you do! Well then let's get started" He states as he laughs.

Hayato lets go of Kenichi and drops him on the ground. Kenichi is breathing heavily mainly because of the smell of the Elder's armpit. It smelled as if he hasn't taken a bath in weeks.
"Master what was that for?!" Kenichi cries up at his master
"HE HE HE. For our training of course" the Elder smirks down at Kenichi,

Hayato strips out of his clothes, he still has his loin cloth on however
"M-m-Master wh-" Kenichi is grabbed by the back of his training shirt. Dragged away in the forest by his master. Once deep into the forest the Elder drops Kenichi in front of him
"Alright I think it's time we get started" the Elder lifts his arms up over his head as a strong musty smell comes from his hairy armpit "Now stand up and lick my armpits!"
Kenichi stood thinking, shaking scared
"He he that's funny master, but really i think I should get back to training now"
"You think this is a joke I'm dead serious now start licking or I could make you do something much, much worse!" The elder yells down at Kenichi with a grin on his face...
114.title: Hayato Furinji, the powerful elder

choices: Hayato begins to crush Kenichi with his butt
1143.content:
Kenichi stands still, still not understanding what the his master is doing
"Master Elder, how exactly does this-" Hayato tires if waiting. Angered, he shoves Kenichi to the ground using only his finger. Kenichi looks up and sees a sadistic from on the doesn't face. He is truly serious. He turns around and stands over Kenichi, giving him an unpleasant view of his buttocks, covered only in his red loincloth.
"Questioning my wisdom, eh boy?" He yells, he lowers himself until he sits down completely on Kenichi's abdomen. Kenichi seems very surprised at this. "Prepare yourself for a little endurance training!"
1143.title: The elder is done waiting and sits on Kenichi

12.title: A big past opponent returns and challenges him

info.brief_description: Kenichi's past opponents and his masters torture him with their godly power. Guys only
info.description:
Kenichi's past opponents and his sensais decide to torture him with their muscles and their stench

Rules Include:

*Only men torture Kenichi
*this does not include Kensai Ma, he tiny, ugly, and gross
*Most torture must include bad smells, like sweat, farts, and groin
*Keep Miu out of this, in fact, keep ALL girls out of this
*If you don't know what Kenichi: The mightiest Disciple is, look it up before adding
*As much as I enjoy gay torture, I must admit that I HATE Kenichi, he is one of my least favorite anime characters, so keep his enjoyment and happines to a minimum
*All the past opponents are the ones that are a lot bigger than Kenichi
*As I repeat, I HATE Kenichi, so pain is allowed
